text: A Christmas Carol is a 1910 American silent drama movie.A CHRISTMAS CAROLA Christmas Carol It stars Marc McDermott, Charles S. Ogle, and William Bechtel. ==Actors== * Marc McDermott as Ebenezer Scrooge * Charles S. Ogle as Bob Cratchit * William Bechtel * Viola Dana * Carey Lee * Shirley Mason ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American silent movies Category:Movies based on books Category:1910 drama movies Category:Movies directed by J. Searle Dawley Category:American drama movies
title: A Christmas Carol (1910 movie)
